title: Purchase Order Request for Proposals (PORFP) Hardware Master Contract
term_of_bid: Proposals/quotes must be valid for at least 90 days after the due date.
payment_terms: Invoices to be emailed to STOaccountspayable@treasurer.state.md.us within 10 days of delivery, including contractor details, PORFP number, date, invoice number, amount due, proof of delivery, packing slip/confirmation, and equipment serial numbers.
additional_documentation_required: Letter of Authorization (LOA) from Manufacturer or Distributor (if requested)
contract_or_cooperative_to_use: Desktop, Laptop and Tablet 2015 Master Contract, 060B5400007
bid_summary: This is a Small Business Reserve (SBR) Purchase Order Request for Proposal (PORFP) under the Hardware Master Contract for the State Treasurer's Office. It is limited to Master Contractors awarded under the Desktop, Laptop and Tablet 2015 Master Contract. The PORFP is for the procurement of Dell Latitude 5550 laptops and Dell Thunderbolt 4 Docks, along with a 3-year extended warranty, to refresh equipment for MD529 employees.
product_specification: The State Treasurer's Office requires a refresh of laptops to accommodate MD529 employees. The procurement includes 30 Dell Latitude 5550 laptops, which must be Microsoft Copilot ready, and 30 Dell Thunderbolt 4 Dock â€“ WD22TB4 units. Additionally, a 3-year Dell Limited Hardware Warranty Extended is required for all machines purchased, starting from the date of delivery. Deliverables include a warranty certificate or affidavit upon award.
